title: Sarwar, Buzdar discuss to take PML-Q on board in Punjab
content:
LAHORE, Feb 10 (APP):Punjab Governor Chaudhry Mohammad Sarwar and Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar met and discussed matters including taking Pakistan Muslim League Quaid (PML-Q) on board in all affairs and progress of developmental projects in the province during a meeting at the Governorâ€™s House, here on Monday.
Punjab Governor Chaudhry Mohammad Sarwar and Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar resolved to fulfill all promises the PTI had made with the people during general election campaign.
It was decided to take effective steps to ensure provision of health, education and other basic facilities.
They also agreed to dedicate all efforts to the uplift and prosperity of the province as per vision of Prime Minister Imran Khan.
Governor Punjab Chaudhry Mohammad Sarwar said the government, under the leadership of Prime Minister Imran Khan, would complete its constitutional term.
